reviews.review:
РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!!!
Очень интересная игра! Сюжет захватующий! В процессе игры можно залипнуть и не оторваться от игры! Когда я впервые запустил игру, то сразу просидел 110 минут! Также в этой игре чтобы побеждать надо пошевелить мозгами! В некоторых моментах игра становиться страшной. И еще одна вам посхалочка, в игре есть секретные комнаты!

You should get this game even if it is 9 years or more old! This game has stunning graphics and lighting and very funny characters! The puzzles can get you thinking and i heard that this game can help your mind! I rate this game a 10 test chambers out of 10 companian cubes
arkadaşla vakit geçirmelik harika bir oyun herkese tavsiye ederim.
классная игрулька.с другом купили не пожалели.Интересная,смешная порой сложная,но в общем довольны.Всем советуем.

Normalde oynamayacaktım ama arkadaşla merak edip giriştik. Önerim: Önce hikayeyi oynayın. Mekaniklere alışıp oyunu bitirdikten sonra multiplayer girin. Çünkü ilk mp girerseniz neye uğradığınızı şaşırırsınız. Ortaya her şeyi atıyor al hadi çöz diyor. Ama gerek hikayesi, gerek oynanışı oldukça tatmin edici
面白いけど酔う。1日1時間
I can't stop coming back to this game. Absolute masterpiece.

One of the best puzzle games ever. The story, visuals and characters are all amazing and the puzzles themself are even better. It also comes packed with a great coop mode and lots of user generated levels. I highly recommend it to anyone that is into puzzle games or wants to get into them, just do your self the favor of also checking out portal 1 because its amazing aswell.

Если любите объёмные головоломки с сюжетом, то покупай.

Плюсы:
1. Бывают головоломки сложные, но обычно быстро решаются
2. Сюжет отличный, для такого жанра
3. По сравненную с первым Portal, графика тут улучшилась, а всяких механик стало больше
Минусы:
1. Кроме пару багов, минусов нет!
Mükkemmel ellerini öpeyim hmm çok leziz

Good game, but god damn is it long...too long. My first playthrough in Portal 1 took me 1.5 hours; for Portal 2, I'm 8 hours in and still have at least 1-2 hours left before I beat it. For some people that might be a good thing, but I enjoyed Portal 1 so much because of its simplicity and the fact that I could play through the whole game in under an hour. It was fun to speedrun and only had 18 levels, plus the boss fight, so all the levels were memorable and unique. This game has countless levels that start to get repetitive. 

6/10
Very good gameplay. Has a good Story
honestly one of the games that DEFINE PC gaming and steam as it is a masterpice that is at first small but the impact is as close as GTAV/online if not more
i mean it kind of has a gun?

I absolutely love the mysterious feel of the Half-Life universe. The puzzles in this game are just a bonus I could play this game just for the lore and the visuals, which still look good especially in the lower parts of the complex, where the game shows you just enough to make you wandering how big the complex actually is. The panorama of the mysterious Aperture laboratories combined with the excellent voice acting for Glados and the occasional Cave Johnson recordings make for an excellent atmosphere while you’re making your way through puzzles made by murderous AI.

Oyun güzel özellikle co op olarak baya iyi ama ben bölümleri oyunun istediği değil kendi istediğimiz tarzda bitirmek isterdim arkadaşla bi bölüme geldik 45 dk uğraştık görevimiz tehlike 7 çektik john wick 4 çektik taşıyıcı 3 çektik ama olmadı sonra youtube dan baktık 2 tana yürüyen am 5 dk da bitirmiş o saaten sonra oyundan biraz soğudum ama gayet alınabilir ve güzel bir oyun

Great Storyline, great tests, and always fun to re-download, and play. There's co-op, and if your friend has the game, make a race to the finish.

This game had exceeded my expectations and still looks fantastic for its age. Extremely funny and way more story and lore than the first one. This game is worth buying, and one of the best games I have ever played.
